sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import OnboardingSideBar from "../components/OnboardingSideBar"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { useQuery } from "react-query"; import useAuthStore from "../stores/authStore"; import { getEmploymentFields } from "../clients/onboarding"; import FormInput from "../components/FormInput"; const Employment = (props: any) => { const token = useAuthStore((state) => state.accessToken); const { isLoading, error, data } = useQuery("data", () => getEmploymentFields(token) ); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm(); const onSubmit = (data: any) => { setSubmitted(true); setTimeout(function () { setSubmitted(false); props.history.push("/onboarding/account"); }, 2000); }; return ( <>

EMPLOYMENT DETAILS

{/*

We hate to ask, but regulations mandate us to.
Your BVN is safe with us!

*/} {submitted ? ( <>

Sent successfully

Employment details created successfully

) : ( <>
{/*

Please fill out this field.

*/}
)}
); }; export default Employment;
